name: vscode-starlims
description: Unofficial dictionary explorer (and more) for STARLIMS.

view/item/context.when: view == STARLIMS && viewItem == HTMLFORMCODE || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == HTMLFORMXML || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == XFDFORMCODE || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == XFDFORMXML || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == SS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == DS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == CS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPSS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPDS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPCS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == HTMLFORMGUIDE
view == STARLIMS && viewItem == SS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == DS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPSS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPDS

view == STARLIMS && viewItem == HTMLFORMCODE || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == HTMLFORMXML || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == XFDFORMCODE || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == XFDFORMXML || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == SS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == DS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == CS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPSS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPDS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPCS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == HTMLFORMGUIDE

view == STARLIMS && viewItem == HTMLFORMCODE || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == HTMLFORMXML || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == XFDFORMCODE || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == XFDFORMXML || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == SS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == DS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == CS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPSS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPDS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == APPCS || view == STARLIMS && viewItem == HTMLFORMGUIDE

STARLIMS.url.description: STARLIMS Installation URL. For example: https://server/STARLIMS.Dev/

scripts.package: npm version patch && webpack --mode production --devtool hidden-source-map
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
